column1: ...Om Puri was born in Ambala in a Punjabi family.  His father worked on the railways and in the Indian Army.  As he had no birth certificate or records, his family was unsure of his date and year of birth, however his mother told him he had been born two days after the Hindu festival Dussehra ....
